description:
Toru Acura is a 20-year-old retired soldier meandering through life now that the war has ended. He encounters Chaika Trabant, a 14-year-old sorceress carrying a coffin, and follows her in hopes of finding meaning to his life again. The two travel with Toru's adopted sister, Akari, the employed member of the group and thus Toru's source of income.

(Source: Anime News Network)

node.description:
__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

**Doujin Circle:** PANDANIKU

Friends with co-worker and fellow Nitroplus artist [Ookuma Nekosuke](https://anilist.co/staff/117125/Nekosuke-Ookuma).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/namaniku_ATK) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/841771)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sei_kou) | [Website](https://www.himemiko.co/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/長岡成貢)

A self-taught composer and arranger.

Affiliated with Mouse.

He is described by his colleagues as someone very efficient with his line work, particularly the speed at which he can make corrections.
